title: two clean fonts
author: weinda

comments.content:
"sucre+confetti" is **[Ratio Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114422/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/ratio-modern/)** [Canada Type, 2011]  
"FOR SWEET..." looks like **[Sackers Gothic Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114422/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Sackers%20Gothic%20Medium%20AT%20-%20Regular&fid=1cd0f9107183ddd03b490d302244e78d&fsize=36&text=FOR%20SWEET%20%26%20STYLISH%20PARTIES&wrap=2)**
Modern No. 20 for the serif face is close and Engraves Gothic BT or Blair ITC are close for the sans. All close but not quite right.
